title: FxGuru Movie FX Director + all 13 effects By Palash
description:
Description
Add the fun and excitement of big-budget Hollywood sci-fi and action movie effects to any video. FxGuru's Movie FX Director offers groundbreaking features for you to blow-away your friends, including:

NOW with 7 FREE effects, including:
Ã¢Ëœâ€  Breaking News - Deliver your own personal newscast to the world

A wide variety of other effects are available, including:
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Sci-Fi Movie / Futuristic / Alien / Fantasy FX: Mech Attack; Mech Battle; UFO Arrival; UFO Invasion; UFO Calling; UFO Landing; Alien Probe; First Contact; Spiderbots; WizardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Wrath; Mech Pilot; Orbital Weapon

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Natural Disaster / Animals FX: Tornado; Lightning Strike; Meteor Impact; Flood Waters; Bird Frenzy; T-Rex; Cockroaches

With FxGuru you can:
Ã¢Ëœâ€  Avoid chores by blowing up your lawnmower, bathroom or pile of leaves.
Ã¢Ëœâ€  Astound friends by filming a UFO invasion over your backyard.
